name: Jim & John (Demo)
description:
Jim & John is a film noir inspired detective adventure with a twist - you're a criminal!

You are John, a professional burglar with a slight drinking habit. Gather information, solve puzzles and get a taste of the game's atmosphere in this short Demo.

This game is best experienced with a gamepad.

To stay up to date on the development process follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/Jim_and_John
